mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_notice ( status, typ, title, wrt_dt, stmt, hide_yn, del_yn, in_dtm, in_id, up_dtm, up_id) VALUES ( #{status}, #{typ}, #{title},curdate(), #{stmt},'n', 'n', now(),'ezmeal', now(), 'ezmeal')
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_notice SET writer = #{writer}, status = #{status}, typ = #{typ}, title = #{title}, wrt_dt = #{wrt_dt}, stmt = #{stmt}, hide_yn = #{hide_yn}, stmt = #{stmt}, WHERE notice_no = #{notice_no}
mapper.select: SELECT notice_no, writer, status, typ, title, DATE_FORMAT(wrt_dt, '%Y-%m-%d') as wrt_dt_format, stmt FROM tb_notice WHERE notice_no = #{notice_no}
SELECT notice_no, writer, status, typ, title, DATE_FORMAT(wrt_dt, '%Y-%m-%d') as wrt_dt_format, stmt FROM tb_notice ORDER BY notice_no DESC LIMIT #{offset},#{pageSize}
SELECT notice_no, writer, status,typ, title, wrt_dt, stmt FROM tb_notice ORDER BY wrt_dt DESC, notice_no DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{pageSize}
